article_title: WEB EXTRA: Indiana First Responders on State Fair Tragedy
article_text: Captain Brian Wisehart and Private John Peach are paramedics with the Indianapolis Fire Department. Both were working the night of August 13, 2011, when a structure above the stage at the Indiana State Fair collapsed onto a crowd waiting for a concert to begin. Here they describe the harrowing scene and the chaotic rescue efforts.

article_summary:
Both were working the night of August 13, 2011, when a structure above the stage at the Indiana State Fair collapsed onto a crowd waiting for a concert to begin.
Captain Brian Wisehart and Private John Peach are paramedics with the Indianapolis Fire Department.
Here they describe the harrowing scene and the chaotic rescue efforts.
